item.title: Getting Started with Apache Pulsar on Kubernetes
item.description: Apache Pulsar is a distributed pub-sub messaging system that I have recently enjoyed testing for some projects of mine. It has grown very much on me and am now preferring it over Apache Kafka. In this post we will go over installing and getting started with an Apache Pulsar instance running on Kubernetes.
